ctl:test.name: wcs2:req43
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req43:For the transmission of all operation requests and responses, WCS implementations shall support at least one WCS protocol extension, that is: an extension whose URI starts with http://www.opengis.net/spec/WCS_protocol-binding_.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] For the transmission of all operation requests and responses, WCS imple-mentations shall support at least one WCS protocol extension, that is: an extension whose URI starts with http://www.opengis.net/spec/WCS_protocol-binding_.
